name: Hound Hunt (Patrick Lawless)
description:
Voted best in animation at GameFleadh 2018,

 Hound hunt lets you jump in to the boots of a cat trying as you follow him on his path to eliminate all the dogs. 

Use creative weapons and your environment to turn the humans against the dogs as you explore the map. But be careful the dons are a lot bigger and stronger

WASD to move and mouse to shoot

'Q' and 'E' to cycle left and right through intro book and switch weapons
